data.nameItinerary: Explore the city of Amsterdam.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to immerse yourself in the culture and history of Amsterdam. From the bohemian charm of the Jordaan to the moving history of the Anne Frank House and the art at the Van Gogh Museum, each location offers a unique experience.

data.nameItinerary: Get to know the center of Ancient Greece, one of the oldest civilizations.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will take you to the heart of ancient Greece in Athens, where you can explore the majesty of the Acropolis, immerse yourself in history at the Acropolis Museum, and marvel at the grandeur of the Temple of Olympian Zeus.

data.nameItinerary: Tour the most relevant infrastructures of Bangkok.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to explore some of Bangkok's most outstanding infrastructure, from the impressive Grand Palace to the magnificent temples of Wat Pho and Wat Arun.

data.nameItinerary: Learn about the historical events that marked the city of Berlin.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to immerse yourself in the history of Berlin and understand the events that have left a deep mark on the city. From the majesty of the Brandenburg Gate to the artistic expression of the East Side Gallery and the moving experience at the Memorial to the Murdered Jews of Europe, each location will give you a unique perspective on Berlin's history and resilience.
data.activitiesThree: Memorial to the Murdered Jews of Europe

data.nameItinerary: Explore the City of Fury.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to explore some of the highlights of Buenos Aires. From the iconic Obelisk that marks the center of the city, to the historic Plaza de Mayo and the modernity of Puerto Madero, each place will offer you a unique experience and a different vision of the City of Fury.

data.nameItinerary: Tour one of the most famous neighborhoods in Buenos Aires.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to explore one of the most famous neighborhoods in Buenos Aires and immerse yourself in the natural and cultural beauty of the area. From the tranquility of the Bosques de Palermo and the charm of the Rose Garden, to the fascinating astronomical world at the Galileo Galilei Planetarium and the serenity of the Japanese Garden, each place will offer you a unique experience and moments of peace in the midst of the bustling city.
data.activitiesOne: Palermo Forests and The Rose Garden

data.nameItinerary: Discover the museums of Buenos Aires.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to immerse yourself in the world of art and culture of Buenos Aires. From contemporary Latin American art at the MALBA, through international masterpieces at the Museo Nacional de Bellas Artes, to the charm of decoration at the Museo Nacional de Arte Decorativo, each place will offer you a unique and enriching experience.
data.activitiesOne: Museum of Latin American Art of Buenos Aires (MALBA)
data.activitiesTwo: National Museum of Fine Arts of Buenos Aires (MNBA)

data.nameItinerary: Immerse yourself in the charm of Cairo.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to immerse yourself in the charm of Cairo and explore some of the most iconic places in the city. From the rich history of the Coptic Quarter, to the grandeur of the Pyramids of Giza and the enigmatic Sphinx, to the fascinating world of ancient Egypt at the Egyptian Museum, each location will give you a unique experience and transport you to a bygone era.
data.activitiesTwo: Great Sphinx of Giza and Great Pyramid of Giza

data.nameItinerary: Tour the holy mosques of the city of Cairo.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to explore the holy mosques of Cairo and immerse yourself in the city's rich history and Islamic architecture. Each mosque will offer you a unique experience, from the revered Al-Azhar Mosque to the impressive Mosque-Madrasa of Sultan Hassan and the iconic Mosque of Muhammad Ali.

This itinerary will allow you to immerse yourself in the opulence and luxury of Dubai. From the imposing height of the Burj Khalifa, through the elegance of the Burj Al Arab, to the mesmerizing choreography of the Dubai Fountain, each place will offer you a unique experience and allow you to appreciate the splendor of this modern and prosperous city.
data.nameItinerary: Discover the luxurious city of Dubai.
Relax on the artificial island of Dubai.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to enjoy a day of relaxation and fun on the artificial island of Dubai. From the excitement of the Atlantis Water Park, to the panoramic views of the Palm Jumeirah Observation Deck, to the charm and elegance of the Dubai Marina, each location will provide you with a unique experience.

data.nameItinerary: Discover the urban life that unfolds in bustling Hong Kong.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to immerse yourself in the urban life of Hong Kong and explore some of its most iconic places. From the panoramic views at Victoria Summit, to the serenity of Tian Tan Buddha and Po Lin Monastery, to the lively Avenue of Stars, each location will give you a unique experience and immerse you in the vibrant atmosphere of the city.
data.activitiesTwo: Tian Tan Buddha and Po Lin Monastery

data.nameItinerary: Explore the history and fight for equality of the city of Johannesburg.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to explore the history and fight for equality in Johannesburg. From the iconic Constitution Hill, to the stunning Apartheid Museum, to the inspiring Nelson Mandela House, each location will give you a unique and in-depth look at the history and challenges South Africa faced on its path to equality.

data.nameItinerary: Discover the wonders of London sailing on the Thames.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to discover some of the wonders of London while cruising the River Thames. From the imposing presence of Big Ben, through the panoramic views from the London Eye, to the architectural beauty of Tower Bridge, each place will offer you a unique experience and allow you to appreciate the grandeur of this cosmopolitan city.

data.nameItinerary: Tour the main tourist spots in London.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to visit some of the most important tourist spots in London. From the grandeur of Westminster Abbey, to the majesty of Buckingham Palace, to the lively atmosphere of Piccadilly Circus, each venue will provide you with a unique experience and allow you to immerse yourself in the city's rich history and culture.

data.nameItinerary: Walk through the most important squares and streets of Madrid.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to explore the most important squares and streets of Madrid. From the bustle of Calle Gran Vía, through the history and beauty of Plaza Mayor, to the lively and emblematic atmosphere of Puerta del Sol, each place will offer you a unique experience and allow you to immerse yourself in the life of the city.

data.nameItinerary: Visit the main infrastructures of Madrid.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to visit some of the main infrastructures of Madrid. From the architectural beauty of the Cathedral of Santa María la Real de la Almudena, through the majesty of the Royal Palace, to the artistic richness of the Prado National Museum, each place will offer you a unique experience and will immerse you in history and culture. from the city.
data.activitiesOne: Almudena Cathedral, Santa María la Real de La Almudena

data.nameItinerary: Connect with the nature of El Retiro Park.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to connect with nature and enjoy the tranquility of El Retiro Park. From the serenity of the Estanque Grande, through the elegance of the Palacio de Cristal, to the beauty of the roses in La Rosaleda, each place will offer you a unique experience and will allow you to escape from the bustle of the city.

data.nameItinerary: Explore the cultural treasures of the historic center of Mexico City.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to immerse yourself in the cultural and historical richness of the historic center of Mexico City. From the imposing Plaza Constitución, through the beauty of the Palacio de Bellas Artes, to the fascinating history of the Templo Mayor, each place will provide you with a unique experience and allow you to explore the cultural treasures of the city.

data.nameItinerary: Get to know Mexico City.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to see some of the most emblematic places in Mexico City. From the religious importance of the Basilica of Santa María de Guadalupe, through the history and beauty of the Chapultepec Castle/Forest, to the grandeur of the Teotihuacán Pyramids, each place will provide you with a unique experience and allow you to immerse yourself in the rich culture and ancient history of Mexico.
data.activitiesOne: Basilica of Our Lady of Guadalupe

data.nameItinerary: Experience the vibrant city of New Delhi.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to experience the vibrant city of New Delhi and explore some of its historical treasures. From the grandeur of Delhi's Red Fort, to the elegance of Humayun's Tomb, to the symbolism of India Gate, each location will give you a unique insight into the city's rich history and culture.

data.nameItinerary: Explore the Big Apple.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to explore some of the highlights of the Big Apple. From the serenity of Central Park, to the symbolism of the Statue of Liberty, to the majesty of the Brooklyn Bridge, each location will give you a unique experience, immersing you in the energy and beauty of New York.

data.nameItinerary: Tour Midtown Manhattan New York, Part 1.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to explore some of the most prominent attractions in New York's Midtown Manhattan. From the breathtaking views of the Empire State Building, to the allure of Rockefeller Center, to the energy and glitter of Times Square, each location will provide you with an unforgettable experience in the city that never sleeps.

data.nameItinerary: Tour Midtown Manhattan New York, Part 2.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will take you through some of the highlights in midtown Manhattan New York. From the grandeur of Grand Central Terminal, to the excitement of Madison Square Garden, to the artistic inspiration of the Museum of Modern Art (MoMA), each location will give you a unique experience in the city's vibrant cultural scene.

data.nameItinerary: Discover the beauty of Paris.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to discover some of the most emblematic places in Paris. From the imposing Eiffel Tower, through the artistic richness of the Louvre Museum, to the grandeur of the Arc de Triomphe, each place will offer you a unique experience and will immerse you in the beauty and history of the city.

data.nameItinerary: Relax on the beaches and with panoramic views of Rio de Janeiro.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to relax and enjoy the panoramic views of Rio de Janeiro. From the majesty of the Christ the Redeemer of Corcovado, through the impressive views from the Sugar Loaf, to relaxation on the famous beaches of Copacabana and Ipanema, each place will provide you with a unique experience and allow you to immerse yourself in the charm and beauty of the city.

data.nameItinerary: Be fascinated by the majesty of the Eternal City.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to be fascinated by the majesty of the Eternal City, Rome. From the grandeur of the Colosseum, through the beauty of the Trevi Fountain, to the magnificence of Saint Peter's Basilica in the Vatican, each place will give you a unique experience and immerse you in the history and culture of the city.

data.nameItinerary: Enjoy the iconic beauty of Sydney Harbor.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to enjoy the iconic beauty of Sydney Harbour. From the stunning architecture of the Sydney Opera House, to the imposing structure of the Sydney Harbor Bridge, to the tranquility of the Royal Sydney Botanic Gardens, each venue will provide a unique experience, immersing you in the natural beauty and culture of Sydney. this seaside town.

data.nameItinerary: Immerse yourself inside the largest metropolis in the world.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to immerse yourself in the largest metropolis in the world, Tokyo. From the vibrant culture of Akihabara, to the majesty of Mount Fuji, to panoramic views from Tokyo Tower, each location will give you a unique experience, immersing you in the diversity and energy of the city.

data.nameItinerary: Connect with the spirituality of the temples of Tokyo.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to connect with the spirituality of Tokyo's temples. From the serenity of the Meiji Jingu Temple, to the majesty of the Sensoji Temple, to the reflection in the Yasukuni Temple, each place will provide you with a unique experience and allow you to immerse yourself in the rich spiritual tradition of Japan.

data.nameItinerary: Getaway Tour to Toronto, Part 1.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to get away and enjoy some of Toronto's top attractions. From the culinary diversity of the St. Lawrence Market, through the lively Dundas Square, to the panoramic views from the CN Tower, each place will provide you with a unique experience and allow you to immerse yourself in the energy and culture of the city.

data.nameItinerary: Getaway Tour to Toronto, Part 2.
data.descriptionItinerary: This itinerary will allow you to get away and enjoy some of Toronto's top attractions. From the marine life of Ripley's Aquarium, to the majesty of Casa Loma, to the natural beauty of Toronto Island Park, each location will provide you with a unique experience and allow you to relax and enjoy different aspects of the city.
